categories: Category:Battles of the Dark Trooper Project
Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Mission to the Executor was a minor conflict during the Galactic Civil War.

After boarding the Executor with a smuggler ship stolen from the Imperial Fuel Station Ergo, Kyle Katarn made his way through inner defenses of the Star Destroyer and got on board a cargo hauler en route to the Arc Hammer.
The success of the mission would lead to the downfall of Rom Mohc and the dark troopers as Katarn sabotaged the Arc Hammer.
